ui.desc: The most sensible way to read your inner self
ui.viralSub: Scan QR code to start the test

items.text: I tend to be the life of the party and enjoy leading conversations.
I make an effort to sympathize with others' feelings.
I prefer to get chores and tasks done right away.
I experience frequent mood swings or emotional shifts.
I have a vivid imagination and enjoy exploring new ideas.
I often find myself staying quiet in large groups of people.
I am sometimes not very interested in other people's problems.
I often forget to put things back in their proper place.
I am relaxed most of the time and don't get upset easily.
I prefer concrete facts over abstract or philosophical ideas.
I find it easy to talk to many different people at social events.
I truly feel and understand the emotions of those around me.
I like to keep my surroundings and work well-organized.
I tend to get upset or stressed quite easily.
I sometimes find it difficult to grasp complex abstract concepts.
I prefer to keep in the background rather than being the center of attention.
I am not really interested in others' personal affairs.
I sometimes make a mess of things or struggle with details.
I seldom feel blue or downhearted.
I do not consider myself to have a particularly creative imagination.

E.high: You are social, energetic, and thrive in the company of others.
E.low: You are reflective, independent, and value your quiet time.

A.high: You are compassionate, cooperative, and value social harmony.
A.low: You are analytical, competitive, and prioritize objective truth.

C.high: You are disciplined, organized, and highly reliable in your work.
C.low: You are flexible, spontaneous, and prefer to go with the flow.

N.high: You are emotionally sensitive and highly aware of potential risks.
N.low: You are emotionally resilient and stay calm under pressure.

O.high: You are curious, creative, and open to new and complex ideas.
O.low: You are practical, traditional, and prefer proven methods.
